sentences.english: No; he never saw him till the other morning at Meryton.
sentences.chinese: 不认识，那天上午在麦里屯他还是初次和他见面。
但是为什么屯的是金子呢？

sentences.english: You saw me dance at Meryton, I believe, Sir.
sentences.chinese: 你大概在麦里屯看见过我舞蹈的吧，先生。

sentences.english: You saw me dance at Meryton, I believe, Sir.
sentences.chinese: 你大概在麦里屯看见过我跳舞的吧，先生。

sentences.english: Located in the north of Napo County, Tunli Tuen is 14 kilometers far from that county.
sentences.chinese: 吞力屯位于那坡县城北部山区，距县城14公里。

sentences.english: The treatment of the wells in Wuzhan and Wangjiatun region shows a good result.
sentences.chinese: 对五站及汪家屯地区的井处理结果表明，效果是好的。

sentences.english: We want to veg out in front of the TV, or take a nap.
sentences.chinese: 能坐在电视机前无所事事或是打个小屯是最大的满足。

sentences.english: Starts part-time position teaching English literature at Pinkerton Academy in Derry .
sentences.chinese: 在这里的平克尔屯学院兼职教授英语文学。

sentences.english: Zhang Gutun, a name not unknown place.
sentences.chinese: 张家屯，一个名不经传的地方。

sentences.english: This place was named Taohua Village.
Did you see him while you were at Lambton?
sentences.chinese: 你在蓝白屯见到过他吗？

sentences.english: Tell me, do you and your sisters very often walk to Meryton?
sentences.chinese: 告诉我，你和你的姐妹们经常上麦里屯溜达吗？
